place mischief cornet wheresoever set battels fought strength army consisted alwayes cornet two principall instrument battel long stood sound victory went alwayes certain part cornet kept enemy incompassing body army advantage also charging upon open side adversary battel cannae hannibal put weakest force battel advancing towards enemy left two cornet behind enemy came charge upon battel easily beat back followed retreat fell two cornet wherein strength army consisted incompassed side defeated overthrown thus see advantage generall hath two cornet stand firm although battel shrink taken spoiled whereby gallia might take occasion revolt forasmuch roman seem afford protection countenance friend otherwise draw army winteringcamps sooner usuall thereby become subject difficulty wrong give suspicion distrust departure propounded unto briefly well deserved state low weak received confined within town land extended associate taken tribute laid upon pledge extorted great contumely fortune greatnesse brought recovered former state exceed dignity favour former time mandate let go noviodunum town hedui situate convenient place upon bank river loire thither caesar sent calling unto town senatores senatorumque filios equitesque romanos senator son senator roman knight shall seem impertinent note degree condition state whereof roman people consisted better clearing whereof understood notable transaction comitium romulus tatius agreed nation dwell together romulus town name called rome inhabitant thereof named quirites name tatius city howbeit specially divided three tribe whereof romulus partyplutarch vita romuli called name rhamnenses came tatius tatienses third tribe lucerences lucus grove forasmuch neither romulus retinue yet sabine neverthelesse met together place diver part grove commonly assembly made offer sacrifice perform heathenish solemnity tribe divided romulus ten curia made number thirty curia curia chose three person presence sufficiency seemed fittest worthy amounted ninety every tribe added three one choosing make number hundred established councel senatesenatus whose advice resolved matter consequence either concerning ready willing passe river horse went caesar moved desire importunity albeit feared expose army river greatness yet thought expedient put triall therefore commanded weakest souldiers century taken whose courage strength shewed disabilitie undertake service left camp one legion defend bringing legion without carriage burden set great number horse cattell river transported army souldiers carried afranius souldiers ran joyfully camp see army casting word derision reproch want victuall fled returned ilerda way held quite contrary intended whereby seemed go back commander much approve counsell kept troups within camp confirmed opinion perceived come without carriage whereby hoped necessity would suffer continue long saw troups little little wind right hand perceived front fallen backward skill pilot well managed happened men found mean grapple ship presently came side rescue neither albici shew backward matter came hand inferiour men courage valour moreover lesser ship cast infinite number dart weapon wherewith men busied fight suddainly wounded conflict two trireme spied brutus ship flag might asily discerned came violently two contrary part danger foreseen brutus prevail swiftnesse ship little outstript whereby coming full swinge encounter one another much shaken blow beakhead one broken water ready come side observed brutus party near set upon thus distressed quickly sunk ship came nasidius found use therefore quickly left fight offered unto either sight countrey exhortation prayer kinsfolk ally motif hazard life quarrell none wanting ship came marseille five sunk imbattelled army cavalry encountering enemy legion could well unfolded put order put flight king force came marching without fear order slew great number foot troups horse making hast got almost safe town way seashore next night two centurion nation marsi fled curio twenty two souldiers actius varus centurion whether please varus otherwise speaking thought men wish easily believe think hope others think confidently affirm mind whole army altogether alienated curio expedient army come sight find mean speak together varus perswaded opinion next day early morning drew legion camp like curio either putting force order upon small valley lay army varus army one sex quintilius varus formerly declared corfinium let go caesar went africk fortuned curio carried legion caesar formerly taken corfinium centurion slain company maniples remained occasion fitly offered quintilius going curio army began beseech souldiers would forget first oath taken domitius treasurer bear arm run fortune endured siege fight way reproach called fugitive added promise put hope good recompence liberality would follow actius delivered unto curio army stood mute declared sign either one way either side drew back camp notwithstanding curio camp afterwards possessed great fear suspicion quickly augmented diver report raised upon every man forged opinion conceit fear added something heard another spread one authour many one received another seemed many authours thingnulla ides pietasque viris qui castra sequ ur venalesqu manus ibi fa ubi maximum ce civile war alwaies compounded men hold lawfull follow please readily obey commanded sent l cassius longinus legion young souldiers called seven twentieth two hundred horse thessalia c calvisius sabinus five cohort horse aetolia exhorting specially take course provision corn two province lay near hand sent likewise cn domitius calvinus two legion eleventh twelfth five hundred horse macedonia province part thereof called frank free menedemus quae libera appellabatur principall man countrey sent embassadour professed exceeding great forwardnesse behalf calvisius upon coming entertained great affection aetolians cast garrison enemy caledon andlep nto naupactum became master aetolia cassius arrived legion thessalia finding two faction accordingly received contrary affection egesaretus man ancient power authority favoured pompey party petreius man noble house endeavoured mean deserve well caesar time also came domitius macedonia embassadours began come thick unto diver state province told scipio hand legion came great fame opinion men two fortification together defence thereof informed pompey two savoiens brought great damage losse people cohort ninth legion kept watch guard upon sea suddenly break day came pompey army seemed strange unto men instantly thereupon souldiers shipboard assaulted weapon inner rampier rest began fill trench legionary souldiers appointed keep inner fortification planted great number ladder rampier amuse enemy weapon engine sort great number chers thronged together side covering osier ware headpiece greatly defend blowes stone weapon men purpose men overlaid thing hardly make resistance pompey souldiers wanting business received pile cast took shock legion kept rank cast pile betook sword time cavalry according commanded issued pompey left cornet whole multitude archer thrust whose assault horseman able endure fell back little place wherein stood whereby pompey horseman began presse eagerness put squadron inclose army caesar perceiving gave signe advancing forward fourth battell made six cohort came upon pompey horseman none able stand turning back onely give place fled fast could highest hill whereby archer slinger left naked without succour put sword violence cohort incompassed left cornet notwithstanding resistance could made pompey party charged behind upon back time caesar commanded third battell yet stood still removed advance forward mean fresh sound men relieving faint weary also others charge behind upon back pompey party able longer endure turned back fled neither caesar deceived opinion beginning victory would grow cohort placed fourth battell horseman according openly spoken incouragement souldiers first cavalry beaten archer slinger slain pompey battell circumvented left cornet mean began flie soon pompey saw cavalry beaten perceived part wherein trusted amused affrighted distrusting rest forthwith left battell conveighed horseback camp speaking centurion watch praetorian gate loud voice souldiers might hear said keep camp defend diligently prevent hard casualty may happen mean go port settle guard camp thus said went praetorium distrusting main point yet expecting event first observation pompey carried course war rather seemed sufferer doer never disposing army attempt onset onely brake place wherein besieged dyrrachium accordingly gave order main action point triall souldiers suffer sustain assault rather otherwise whether well hath since question caesar utterly disliked thing contrary reasonplutarch est quaedam saith animi incitatio atque alacritas naturaliter innata omnibus quae stud pugnae incenditur hanc non reprimere sed augere imperatores debent certain incitation alacrity spirit naturally planted every man inflamed desire fight neither commander represse restrain rather increase set forward agreeable whereunto cato great case battell enemy charged violence purpose requisite put souldiers reasonable distance posture vaunting definance menace cry terrour spring forward manner may make fall upon project farre rashnesse barbarous people wont use determined make best advantage thing intent enemy disdaining small company make haste come field three old practised legion seventh eighth ninth singular valour prowesse eleventh chosen young men great hope towardnesse time received eight yeares wage notwithstanding lookd upon comparable three either standing valour courage wherefore summoning assembly declaring thing reported unto confirmed heart common souldiers peradventure number three legion might draw enemy fight field set battel order seventh eighth ninth legion went carriage driveth men thereunto hope safety resteth onely voctory revolted become valiant obstinate constant faithfull end never falleth hope enemy clemency plentifull example thereof caesar greater part revolt attending direction shall commanded follower shall according motion leader foremost man order excused attend motion leader move many file thus disposed together leader making one front follower observing likewise one proportion distance side file thus joyned make one battallionbattallion front whereof called rank likewise second third deptha rank front according number men file first second ninth ranksthe second ninth rank also may furnished next sufficient men nearnesse unto danger also leader bringers shall either slain disabled wound may presently succeed place make good also good decorum observed middlementhe fifth sixth rank fifth sixth rank men armes march middleman sixth rank shall called front leader may sort proportion answer place also double front calling middleman
